column5: Inspired by the world renowned street art of Berlin; this range is modern vibrant and eye catching. If you want to brighten up your loungeroom this rug centre piece will be your hero.
column6: 100% Heat set polypropylene frise; machine made
column7: Non-shedding; highly stain resistant; durable; tight weave; soft under foot; vibrant colour pallete; colour fast; antistatic and easy to clean.
column13: Regular vacuuming required. Do not use power or rotary vacuum cleaners. Professional cleaning recommended. Any spills should be blotted up immediately. Keep out of direct sunlight.
